movie.title: Welcome to Me
movie.actors: Kristen Wiig, Wes Bentley, Linda Cardellini, Joan Cusack
movie.plot: When Alice Klieg wins the Mega-Millions lottery, she immediately quits her psychiatric meds and buys her own talk show.
movie.tomatoConsensus: A transfixing central performance by Kristen Wiig performance holds Welcome to Me together and compensates for its uneven stretches.
